team1.name: Nabila Ummul Husna
team1.quote: ''The future belongs to those who believe in the beauty of their dreams.''

team1.name: Muhammad Farhan
team1.quote: ''Embrace the journey, for within each step lies the beauty of life.''

team1.name: Aditya Muhamad Fadhillah Umar
team1.quote: ''Code is like a jokes. When you have to explain it, itâ€™s bad.''

team2.name: Alex Saputra
team2.quote: ''Life is not about waiting for the storm to pass. It's about learning to dance in the rain.''

team2.name: Ahmadi Adi
team2.quote: ''Believe that life is worth living and your belief will help create the fact.''

team2.name: Salsa Bila Putri Maharani
team2.quote: ''Happiness is not something ready-made. It comes from your own actions.''

team2.name: Riski Anabela
team2.quote: ''The best preparation for tomorrow is doing your best today.''

team3.name: Hannah Zakiyya
team3.quote: ''If you cannot do great things, do small things in a great way.''

team3.name: Tiara Hanida
team3.quote: ''Success is not the key to happiness. Happiness is the key to success.''

team3.name: Carlos Panjaitan
team3.quote: ''The only limit to our realization of tomorrow will be our doubts of today.''

team3.name: Fitria Putri Andreanita
team3.quote: ''The journey of a thousand miles begins with a single step.''
